DOC.brief_summary: This study Post-Marketing Surveillance study Korea evaluate safety efficacy Combigan® ( brimonidine tartrate/timolol maleate ) Ophthalmic Solution patient Open Angle Glaucoma Ocular hypertension insufficient response local beta blocker treat per standard care clinical practice .
